tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MessageContent ( 
  message_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  message_text TEXT NOT NULL, 
  is_abusive BOOLEAN NOT NULL
)
CREATE TABLE message (id INT, content TEXT, user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE user (user_id INT, username TEXT, email TEXT);
CREATE TABLE abuse_reports (report_id INT, message_id INT, user_id INT, report_reason TEXT, report_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE blocked_users (block_id INT, user_id INT, blocked_user_id INT, block_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE AbuseReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    message_id INT NOT NULL,
    reporter_id INT NOT NULL,
    report_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ReportedMessages (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    message_id INT NOT NULL,
    reporter_id INT NOT NULL,
    report_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
